title: Is it correct that modern humans are more selfish and violent than ancient humans? - Quora

response.answer_text: I would say that up until very recently human behaviour has been remarkably static and predictable. Sadly, I think that the advent of the internet has highlighted and spread some of our worst traits as a species. I think that humanity has always been violent and self-serving and generally has sought ways to get the most for the least amount of work. Over the last 20–30 years though I think that we have become desensitized to violence, we have become more selfish than self-centred, and we have not only become lazy, but worse, we have become intellectually lazy.
